emails.caption: Email (support)
emails.description: Public support alias for HashJing NFT enquiries (forwards to the author).

emails.caption: Email (personal)
emails.description: Personal inbox of the creator — use for partnerships, legal or press questions.

x.caption: X (HashJing-project)
x.description: Official drop-focused account — mint countdowns, trait reveals, giveaways.

x.caption: X (personal)
x.description: Creator’s personal profile — dev logs, generative-art threads, philosophy notes.

discord.caption: Discord (server)
discord.description: Main Discord server. Contains the **HashJing NFT** section with channels #welcome-hj, #pre-mint, #mint-live, #holders.

discord.caption: Discord (vanity invite)
discord.description: Vanity invite link for HashJing — takes you straight to the DataSattva Discord server.

HJ.caption: Live Demo
HJ.description: Online generator: type any text / hash and get an instant SVG / PNG mandala.

HJ.caption: Mint Preview (Testnet)
HJ.description: Sepolia preview — decodes tokenURI and shows how the main-net mint will look.

HJ.caption: Mint Main-net
HJ.description: Final mint page for the HashJing NFT collection on Ethereum main-net.

HJ.caption: GitHub (core)
HJ.description: Core HashJing generator (Python / JS). MIT-licensed notebooks, docs and examples.

HJ.caption: GitHub (NFT contracts)
HJ.description: Solidity contracts, Hardhat tests and deployment scripts for the on-chain collection.

HJ.caption: Medium blog
HJ.description: Future home for deep-dive articles: entropy visuals, teaching guides, project updates.
